mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DATAKEY, t1.DATASYNCOUT2ID, t1.DATASYNCOUT2NAME, t1.DEID, t1.DENAME, t1.ERROR, t1.EVENTTYPE, t1.SYNCAGENT, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFDATASYNCOUT2 t1

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DATAKEY`, t1.`DATASYNCOUT2ID`, t1.`DATASYNCOUT2NAME`, t1.`DEID`, t1.`DENAME`, t1.`ERROR`, t1.`EVENTTYPE`, t1.`SYNCAGENT`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_SRFDATASYNCOUT2` t1
SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DATAKEY, t1.DATASYNCOUT2ID, t1.DATASYNCOUT2NAME, t1.DEID, t1.DENAME, t1.ERROR, t1.EVENTTYPE, t1.SYNCAGENT, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_DATASYNCOUT2 t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.DATAKEY AS DATAKEY, t1.DATASYNCOUT2ID AS DATASYNCOUT2ID, t1.DATASYNCOUT2NAME AS DATASYNCOUT2NAME, t1.DEID AS DEID, t1.DENAME AS DENAME, t1.ERROR AS ERROR, t1.EVENTTYPE AS EVENTTYPE, t1.SYNCAGENT AS SYNCAGENT, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFDATASYNCOUT2 t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.DATAKEY AS DATAKEY, t1.DATASYNCOUT2ID AS DATASYNCOUT2ID, t1.DATASYNCOUT2NAME AS DATASYNCOUT2NAME, t1.DEID AS DEID, t1.DENAME AS DENAME, t1.ERROR AS ERROR, t1.EVENTTYPE AS EVENTTYPE, t1.SYNCAGENT AS SYNCAGENT, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFDATASYNCOUT2 t1

SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[DATAKEY], t1.[DATASYNCOUT2ID], t1.[DATASYNCOUT2NAME], t1.[DEID], t1.[DENAME], t1.[ERROR], t1.[EVENTTYPE], t1.[SYNCAGENT], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN] FROM [T_SRFDATASYNCOUT2] t1
